title: Baycrest: 7th Floor w/ Views, Remodeled, Gym, Pool, Parking **Video**
posting_body: ['Baycrest: 7th Floor w/ Views, Remodeled Kitchen/Bath, Gym, Pool, Racquetball & Parking', 'Property Address', '201 Harrison St. #726 | San Francisco, CA 94105', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'SF City Rents, PC |', 'show contact info', 'Description', '**You can watch a video walkthrough of the actual condo here: <URL>', '**To schedule an in-person tour or a Zoom/FaceTime tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>', 'Enjoy life on the SF water front!', 'Features include:', '- Bridge and water views', '- Remodeled kitchen', '- Remodeled bathroom', '- Wood floors throughout', '- Walk in closet w/ storage system', '- Washer and dryer in-unit', 'Building features include:', '- 24-hour lobby staff', '- Fitness/weight rooms', '- Outdoor heated pool, hot tub and sauna', '- 2 beautiful gardens w/ BBQs', '- Racquetball court', '- Bike storage', '- Package delivery service', '- One garage parking spot is available for $200/month additional', '- Water and trash included in rent', "Located in a dynamic South Beach location near restaurants, the Ferry Building, transportation, freeways, and a 5-minute walk to the waterfront, you won't miss a beat!", 'Just blocks from the Bay Bridge and Salesforce Transit Center with great access to I-80, 280 and 101.', 'Unfurnished 12 month lease.', 'Tenant pays refundable moving deposit to HOA.', 'Square footage is approximate.', 'Non-smoking unit.', 'Small pets considered on a case by case basis.', 'We look forward to hearing from you!', 'SF City Rents', 'DRE# 02187202 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 201 Harrison #726)', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'This unit may not be subject to rent increase restrictions.', 'Amenities', 'Garage Parking', 'Laundry in unit', 'Views', 'Remodeled', 'Walk-in Closet', 'Gym', 'Heated Pool', 'Spa', 'Bike Storage', 'Racquetball Court', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 795 approximately', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,295.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $40.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats considered on a case by case basis', 'Small dogs considered on a case by case basis']
